name: imgix-core-js
description: Common boilerplate for all imgix JavaScript-based functionality.

scripts.compile: mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs ./src/imgix-core-js.js -o ./dist/imgix-core-js.min.js && cp ./src/imgix-core-js.js ./dist/imgix-core-js.js && cp ./src/imgix-core-js.d.ts ./dist/imgix-core-js.d.ts && tsc
scripts.prepublish: npm run compile && npm run assert_version
